author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

I've created release `v0.0.1`, [here](https://github.com/PoisotLab/EcologicalNetworksPlots.jl/releases/tag/v0.0.1) it is.
<!-- bfe4f970-9746-11e9-8c3e-89b590e470b2 -->
